targets.expr: sum(topk(1, azimuth_kube_cluster_template * on(instance, template) group_left() label_replace(azimuth_kube_clustertemplate_deprecated, "template", "$1", "template_name", "(.+)")) by(cluster_namespace, cluster_name)) by(template)

panels.description: Number of cluster templates that are marked as deprecated.
panels.title: Deprecated templates

panels.description: Number of clusters that are using a deprecated template.

targets.expr: sum(topk(1, azimuth_kube_cluster_template * on(instance, template) group_left() label_replace(azimuth_kube_clustertemplate_deprecated, "template", "$1", "template_name", "(.+)")) by(cluster_namespace, cluster_name))

panels.title: Deprecated clusters

targets.expr: topk(1, azimuth_kube_clustertemplate_kube_version * on(instance, template_name) group_left() azimuth_kube_clustertemplate_deprecated) by(template_name)

label_join(topk(1, azimuth_kube_cluster_template * on(instance, cluster_namespace, cluster_name) group_left(kube_version) azimuth_kube_cluster_kube_version * on(instance, cluster_namespace, cluster_name) group_left(phase) azimuth_kube_cluster_phase * on(instance, cluster_namespace, cluster_name) group_left(networking_phase) label_replace(azimuth_kube_cluster_networking_phase, "networking_phase", "$1", "phase", "(.+)") * on(instance, cluster_namespace, cluster_name) group_left(control_plane_phase) label_replace(azimuth_kube_cluster_control_plane_phase, "control_plane_phase", "$1", "phase", "(.+)")) by(cluster_namespace, cluster_name), "cluster", "/", "cluster_namespace", "cluster_name")

label_join(topk(1, label_replace(azimuth_kube_cluster_template, "template_name", "$1", "template", "(.+)") * on(instance, template_name) group_left() azimuth_kube_clustertemplate_deprecated) by(cluster_namespace, cluster_name), "cluster", "/", "cluster_namespace", "cluster_name")

label_join(topk(1, azimuth_kube_cluster_node_phase * on(instance, cluster_namespace, cluster_name, node) group_left(kubelet_version) azimuth_kube_cluster_node_kubelet_version) by(cluster_namespace, cluster_name, node), "cluster", "/", "cluster_namespace", "cluster_name")
